concept: Use for loops and while loops to perform repeated tasks.

challenges.title: Print 1 to N
challenges.description: Given N, print numbers from 1 to N each on a new line.
challenges.outputDescription: Numbers from 1 to N separated by new lines.

challenges.title: Factorial of N
challenges.description: Given N (0 <= N <= 10), print N! (factorial of N).
